felix.felix/fang/breach_charge_nag: What are you daft? Pick up the charge and get moving.
felix.felix/fang/breach_charge_pickup: Do you know what sort of deal I had to make with Booth to get that breach?
felix.felix/fang/end: I was worried I had to be delivering bad news tonight.
felix.felix/fang/intro: Desperate times and blah blah blah.
felix.felix/fang/investigate_farm: That does not look like regular farm equipment
felix.felix/fang/second_breach: That was on me, sorry mate.
felix.felix/fang/shoot_truck: Would it kill you to try and be subtle.
felix.felix/hydra/complete_06: I think you two earned some RNR.
felix.felix/hydra/complete_08: Kotaro and Carmen couldn't have done it better.
felix.felix/hydra/complete_20: I hope Valeria was watching from her hospital bed.
felix.felix/hydra/complete_26: I wasn't worried for a second.
felix.felix/hydra/complete_28: You earned your hazard pay today.
felix.felix/hydra/complete_29: We don't do this for the glory.
felix.felix/hydra/complete_36: Hope you got space on your dress uniform for more medals.
felix.felix/hydra/complete_46: The last time I smiled this much, I was told I could stop paying alimony.
felix.felix/hydra/complete_50: You are the best, of the best.
felix.felix/hydra/heavy_05: There's a big boy coming your way.
felix.felix/hydra/mid_mission_02: Don't get cocky, the battle isn't over yet.
felix.felix/hydra/start_austria_05: Hope you don't mind the cold.
felix.felix/hydra/start_canals_02: My advice, take out the T's quick and take a Gondola ride.
felix.felix/hydra/start_canals_03: Don't have a rendezvous with an arms dealer daughter.
felix.felix/hydra/start_general_19: There's two of you, and a hell of a lot more of them
felix.felix/hydra/start_grenade_04: We have a surplus of grenades.
felix.felix/hydra/start_inferno_05: This is one of my favorite places to go on holiday.
felix.felix/hydra/start_thrill_04: Alchemy towers is a horrific ride.
felix.felix/hydra/start_thrill_05: Be sure to ride the wivin.
felix.felix/hydra/start_weapon_04: Look at it as an adventure.
felix.felix/op7/705: Phoneix made a play in Turkey.
felix.felix/op7/720: A disoriented enemy, is an enemy that is not murdering you.
felix.felix/other/bomb-planning: What if I told you we only had two packs of C4.
felix.felix/other/hard: Ehhh, looking for a challenge eh?
felix.felix/other/home-free: I don't know how to drive stick.
felix.felix/other/wave_completed_05: Remind me to give you boys a raise.
felix.felix/web/felix_enter_office_01: What? How did he get away.
felix.felix/web/felix_virus_01: Imagine what this virus would do if it were released on a population centre.

hostage.hostage/notleaveme: You're not going to leave me here right?
